CustomField.description:
Period is used to identify the specific month the sale is coming out of.
When forecasting, you will only have to add one period/month to the forecast line and the remaining periods will auto-populate for you. (ie - January = 1; August = 8)
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Period is used to identify the specific month the sale is coming out of.
When forecasting, you will only have to add one period/month to the forecast line and the remaining periods will auto-populate for you. (ie - January = 1; August = 8)
CustomField.label: Period
